title: [Large-Scale] Language Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program for Vocational Training Institutions: ISD Model-Based Language Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education experience (grammar/reading/writing) and practical knowledge in professional fields, proficiency in basic smartphone usage
context.additional_context: While the environment supports smartphone-based learning, PC usage is limited. Operating a flexible assessment system centered on formative evaluations. Focuses on enhancing learners' job-related language expression skills and strengthening practical document-writing abilities.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the five phases of the ISD model to create a language curriculum design plan and establish text analysis and vocabulary utilization strategies reflecting professional workplace contexts.
Learners can systematically analyze language learning problems (reading, writing, expression) reflecting professional practice contexts and develop situational communication strategies.
Learners can develop at least three types of formative assessment tools (quizzes, recordings, feedback) executable in smartphone environments and measure learners' mastery of grammar and vocabulary.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
